data.text: @maidep Hi, I´ve answered already your private message. Best regards, Denis

urls.title: Book now and discover the most beautiful destinations
urls.description: Even in these times, we bring you safely to your desired destination. Whether on the ground or in the air: we always pay attention to hygiene and your health.

data.text:
@PartaliSarah @flughafen_wien Dear Sarah,
sorry to hear you're still waiting. We kindly ask you for some more patience. Our colleagues are doing their best.
Kind regards
Alessandra

@PsychSchool Hi there,
If we do not find your bag within five days, please send the completed Baggage Questionnaire Form to vielzos@austrian.com.
Important: List the contents of the missing bag as precisely as possible. This makes it easier for us to search for it.
Best regards, Alessandra

@christopheredi @bmsgpk @vki_konsument Hi Edi, es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten hattest telefonisch mit uns in Kontakt zu treten. Aufgrund der aktuellen Situation sind leider alle unsere Kanäle überlastet und es kann zu längeren Wartezeiten kommen. Liebe Grüße, Denis

@nourhanabuzolof Hi, our colleagues are doing their best to process each bag as quickly as possible to get it to its destination. We are sincerely sorry for the stress and inconvenience this has caused you. Best regards, Denis

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@viktoriyascret Hi Viktoriya, we are sincerely sorry for the stress and inconvenience this has caused you. Please send your feedback to my colleagues from Customer Relations via our online form: https://t.co/dmK1I7JoWk They will then review your matter and get back to you. 
Best regards, Denis

@BarBoate Hi Julien, our colleagues will reply to you as soon as possible. They are confronted with a high amount of requests at the moment and this makes it difficult for them to keep the usual average responding time. We appreciate your continued patience. Best regards, Denis

@onecent_ Hi, our colleagues will reply to you as soon as possible. They are confronted with a high amount of requests at the moment and this makes it difficult for them to keep the usual average responding time. We appreciate your continued patience. Best regards, Denis

@Vaux_eVelin Hi, I am sorry to hear that. The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your lost baggage report or you can check the status of your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeJ2rHC Best regards, Alessandra

@anna_lmnv Hi Anna, we are sincerely sorry for the stress and inconvenience this has caused you. Have you filed a claim at the airport? My colleagues are doing their best to process each bag as quickly as possible to get it to its destination. Best regards, Denis
@RobboRants [2/2] Please send an email to our colleagues at  centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com. Kind regards, Derya

@RobboRants [1/2] Hi Rob,  we are sorry to hear that your girlfriend´s baggage was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you.

@marshallreport Hi Jon, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@neveen___a Hi Neveen, we are sorry that we can´t be of help in terms of tracking baggage :( I keep my fingers crossed for you that you will be reunited with your baggage soon. Kind regards, Derya

@JonnySLM Hi, es tut uns sehr leid, dass dein Koffer nicht mit dir angekommen ist. Bitte kontakitere unsere KollegInnen über die Nummer auf deinem Missing Luggage Report, da wir, das Social Media Team, leider keinen Zugang zum Gepäckssystem haben. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @RogerBronchal Hi Roger, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. Please feel free to seek reimbursement by submitting a claim here: https://t.co/DlPk2wk146  Kind regards, Chris

@aka_Jewlz Hi Michael, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@gummibaat Hi Marvin, wir werden das mit den "2 kontrollierte Taschen" gleich mal in Angriff nehmen. Liebe Grüße, Sandra

@_gabimaru @ludovick_94800 @parisaeroport [1/2] Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@_gabimaru @ludovick_94800 @parisaeroport [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. 
Best regards, Shawn

@marsadle @itaairways [1/2] Hi Markus, 
Please be assured that our colleagues are fully aware that people need their luggage and are working around the clock to process each bag and reunite passengers with their luggage.

@marsadle @itaairways [2/2] Unfortunately, there is currently a considerable backlog which is why it is taking longer than normal. We apologize for this. 
Best regards, Shawn

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@m_charalambous [2/2]  Please use the following link https://t.co/FklNI5CBeC - Please fill out the online form and also attach any payments you have covered because of the current sitaution. 
Best regards, Shawn

@m_charalambous [1/2] Hi Mikey, 
we are sorry to hear that you had to experience such a journey with us. Regarding any compensation request due to this inconvenience and the irregularity, we kindly ask you to submit your concern via our web page.

@BeccaMar4 [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. 
Best regards, Shawn
@BeccaMar4 [1/2] Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.
@CosmoCosm0 Hi there, please send us your booking code via DM and we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Daphne

data.text:
@bes85548054 @Ryanair [1/2] Hi there, 
we are sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.
@LauraHausman3 Hi Laure, we kindly ask you not to post any of your personal data in public, also for your own safety. Please use the desktop version to change your data. Kind regards, Daphne

@Bchap7893 [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. 
Best regards, Shawn
@Bchap7893 [1/2] Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@marsadle [3/3] Die zuständigen Kolleg:innen tun ihr Bestes und werden dein Anliegen so schnell wie möglich beantworten. 
Liebe Grüße, Shawn

@marsadle [2/3]  Sehr gerne Kannst du unsere Kolleg:innen in Wien über die folgende E-Mail Adresse: viellos@austrian.com kontaktieren. Bitte beachte, dass es aufgrund der erheblichen Anzahl von Anfragen, die an unseren Kolleg:innen gesendet werden, derzeit auch zu Wartezeiten kommen kann.

@marsadle [1/3] Hi Markus, es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten hattest telefonisch mit uns in Kontakt zu treten. Aufgrund der aktuellen Situation sind leider alle unsere Kanäle überlastet und es kann zu längeren Wartezeiten kommen.

@m_charalambous [2/2] We kindly ask you to fill up the form and attach any additional collection you have covered during the inconvenience. My colleagues will check your claim and get in touch with you for further info. Thank you for you patience and understanding. 
Best regards, Shawn

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@m_charalambous [1/2] Hi Mikey, 
we are happy to hear that you have been reunited with your luggage. Please send us your claim for compensation or any reimbursement due to the given circumstances via the following link https://t.co/FFefe6Jqyt -
@Cootings Hi Ralph, to ensure that no food may be wasted, only one would be served. But you can surely ask our colleagues on board if you can have another one.😊 Kind regards, Daphne

@LeeRosen @LauraHausman3 @USDOT Hi Lee, please try to reach out to our colleagues at the lost and found counter at the airport directly. They will assist you with your baggage when it's located in Vienna. Kind regards, Derya

@gabbin_gaby Hi, we apologize for the delay. Please be assured that our colleagues know that people need their luggage and are working around the clock to process each bag and reunite passengers with their luggage. Unfortunately, there is currently a considerable backlog. Kind regards

@LoetvVeghel @swissportNews @LgsHandling @flughafen_wien Hi there, unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. Please send an email to our colleagues at viellos@austrian.com or centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com if your bag is missing already over a week. Kind regards, Derya
@nandokasteleijn Hi Nando, please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly take a closer look into this matter. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@LauraHausman3 @USDOT Hi Laura, if they left you a message they should have provided a number. We can only ask you to keep trying this number. You can update the address on file via our online tracker: https://t.co/ijAmebwnVf Kind regards, Lyndsay

@AndymacSyd Hi Andy,  please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused by the loss of your baggage. Please send an email to our colleagues at centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com.I hope you will be reunited with your baggage soon. Kind regards, Derya
@kimberlybyday Hi, then please put your name as that is the most likely. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@WolleBlog Hi, gerne informiere ich dich, dass an Bord von Austrian Airlines Flügen die Maskenpflicht seit Anfang Juni aufgehoben ist. Hier halten wir uns an die gesetzlichen Bestimmungen. Liebe Grüße, Derya

@mdbergfeld [2/2]  Unfortunately, there is currently a considerable backlog which is why it is taking longer than normal. Our respective colleagues will get in touch with you as soon as they have further info. Thank you for understanding. 
Best regards, Shawn

@mdbergfeld [1/2] Hi Mark, please be assured that our colleagues are fully aware that people need their luggage and are working around the clock to process each bag and reunite passengers with their luggage.

@SportManDan [2/2] On the other hand, we can't provide you with any other contact, as all of the available ones are already listed online on our web page. We do apologize for the inconvenience.
Best regards, Shawn

@SportManDan [1/2] Hi Dan, 
We are sorry that you had difficulty contacting us by phone. Due to the current situation, unfortunately, all our channels are overloaded and there may be longer waiting times.

@LauraHausman3 @USDOT Hi, I am very sorry for the delay. Unfortunately, there is a considerable backlog which our colleagues are doing their best to work through. If Vienna was your final destination you can also go to the airport and look for your luggage with our colleagues. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@BStitkovac Hi Berina, we apologize for the delay. Please use our online tracking tool: https://t.co/5a1xgUCD33 Any updates will be loaded here. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@kimberlybyday Hi Kim, normally the bags will be checked in according to your allowance - so probably one piece on each name - but you check on the claim tag you received when you checked them in - the surname should be printed on there. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@xDebzz Hi Debie, yes, on long haul flights there are pillows provided. Kind regards, Daphne

@danhardaker Hi, our colleagues will reply to you as soon as possible. They are confronted with a high amount of requests at the moment and this makes it difficult for them to keep the usual turnaround time. We apologize and appreciate your continued patience. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@balloonsdontpo1 Hi there, Sorry! We don't have access to the baggage system and can't provide you with any updates. The correct contact is the number on your lost report, only they will be able to provide you with the current status, you may also track the status online. Best regards, Denis

@pharangry [2/2]Sehr gerne informieren wir dich, dass du die für deinen Aufenthalt notwendigen Kleidungsstücke/Gegenstände gemäß den allgemeinen Bestimmungen kaufen, wonach bei vorübergehendem Gepäckverlust Hygieneartikel zu 100 % und

@pharangry [1/2]Hallo Aya, es tut uns sehr leid, dass es während deiner Reise zu diesen Unannehmlichkeiten gekommen ist. Wir bitten dich um ein wenig Geduld, da wir derzeit sehr viele Koffer zur Bearbeitung haben und deshalb kommt es derzeit zu längeren Wartezeiten.

@hritane_s Hi Sophie, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding.
Best regards, Denis

urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @acnzimmer @MUC_Airport @eurowings is stated. They will have all the required information about your case and can also look it up for you. If you do not have a report yet, I would recommend filling out the online form via desktop version here: https://t.co/gkxxiAghiq Kind regards, Daphne[2/2]

@acnzimmer @MUC_Airport @eurowings Hi Adam, unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any baggage systems. Have you filed a report at the lost & found counter at the airport? You will have received there a Passenger Irregularity Report where the contact from the responsible colleagues [1/2]

@snowinapril16 Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@natasha_jane18 Hi there, we're sorry that you're having trouble checking in online. If you want to, you can send us your booking code via DM and we can check for you! Kind regards, Daphne

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Scoopyevans through this online form: https://t.co/gkxxiAghiq They can tell you more detailed information when you would consider a bag as "lost". Kind regards, Daphne [3/3]

@Scoopyevans our colleagues are doing their utmost to reunite the bags with their owners but every case is handled individually. Either refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or contact the responsible colleagues directly via desktop version [2/3]

@Scoopyevans Hi there, due to the current situation in the airline industry, which is suffering from bottlenecks, adverse weather conditions, or technical problems in the baggage handling areas which are also causing delayed luggage, we can not tell an exact time at the moment. As of now[1/3]

@LoetvVeghel Hi there, The baggage will be delivered to the address mentioned in your report. You can amend that address online. If your baggage has been missing for more than 5 days, please send the following form via vielzos@austrian.com https://t.co/YvYTtEU6Jc Kind regards, Chris

@Debora__k Hi there, Austrian Airlines comply with the entry regulations specified by the respective national authorities. For detailed information on the currently valid entry and transit regulations, please contact the responsible authorities or the embassy directly. Kind regards, Chris

@VPaul583 Hi Paul, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@mickywillis5 Hi Micky, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please be assured that our colleagues try their best to reunite you with your remaining bags as soon as possible. Due to the current situation, this can, unfortunately, take longer than usual. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Austrian Melangerie
urls.description: Willkommen bei der Austrian Melangerie: Genießen Sie ausgewählte österreichische Speisen und regionale Snacks auf unseren Kurz- und Mittelstreckenflügen.

data.text: @emmmmkkkk @nadjasnews Auf Kurzstreckenflüge unter 3 Stunden bieten wir mit der Austrian Melangerie ein vielfältiges Angebot (auch an vegetarischen und veganen Produkten): https://t.co/LfuIsV0Xkb

@Trewton Hi Trevor, if you already made a report, our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. Unfortunately, we have no way of speeding up that process and cannot advise a specific time frame. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Denis

urls.title: Sondermenüs - Austrian Holidays
urls.description: Ganz gleich ob Sie aus gesundheitlichen Gründen oder aus religiöser Überzeugung einen besonderen Essenswunsch haben, wir h aben die passende Mahlzeit für Sie. Austrian Holidays bietet Ihnen eine Auswahl von 7 unterschiedlichen Spezialmenüs, die in der Economy Class auf allen Kurz- und Mittelstreckenflügen, ab einer Flugzeit von 02:20 Stunden kostenlos buchbar sind. Bitte beachten Sie dass Austrian Airlines keine Verantwortung für eine allergische Reaktion auf Speisezutaten, die möglicherweise a n Bord

data.text: @nadjasnews Liebe Frau Hahn, bei Austrian Holidays Flügen können Menüwünsche vor Abflug bekanntgegeben werden (https://t.co/ebiyYRuki4). Auf der Mittelstrecke sind natürlich immer veg.Alternativen an Bord verfügbar & auf der Langstrecke wird in der Economy Class ausschließlich veg. serviert.

@onecent_ @mogriffs Hi there, as all cases are handled individually and due to the high amount of inquiries at the moment, you will experience a longer waiting time. But be assured, that they will answer your inquiry as soon as possible. We kindly ask for your patience. Kind regards, Daphne

@keefer_susan Hi Susan, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@sasaaaaV Hi Sasa, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
